resources.string: Please select the type of vocabulary added.
There are not enough voca to test for this type.\nPlease use All type test or add new vocabulary.
The problem will be questions as Excel file order.
The problem will not be questions as Excel file order.
Send an email to the developer.
The donation would be a big help to the developer.
Would you like to add wrong problems to this vocabulary group?
There is a record was studied.\nWould you like to learn from where you did?\n(If the previous record disappears again from the beginning.)
Are you sure you want to exit the learning?\nYou can learn content from here when you come back.
Are you sure you want to quit?

"VOCA DIY" app is memorizing the words you want to memorize words by uploading directly. 

 You must save yourself the words you want to memorize the Excel file. 

 When you save an Excel file There is a simple rule. 

 The user must enter a value in a total of three columns. 

 The first column is the part of speech of the word, the second column is the word, and the third column is the meaning of the word. 

 You entered parts of speech helps to provide a great view from the multiple-choice questions.

Alphabet to write the part of speech is defined by part of speech. 
 [ n ]: Noun 
 [ v ]: Verb 
 [ a ]: Adjective 
 [ ad ]: Adverb 
 [ e ]: Other Parts of Speech 

 If a word has two meaning that if you type:

Word learning can be a total of four types. 

 First, just learn the words. 
 Second, looking at the problem of finding meaning in the word-choice questions. 
 Third, looking at the problem of finding word in the meaning-choice questions. 
 Fourth, the problem will write the words to see yourself. 

 Wrong answers can be seen right back test, add a new vocabulary or you can also add to the existing vocabulary. 

 You can change the order option of questions in the "Settings" view.
